entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:16 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -36.1°C

Condition: Mostly Cloudy

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill minus 63 in the morning and minus 57 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41 with temperature rising to minus 37 by morning.
